comments:
Build 20020411
Auto-build off
Workspace built with 20020409

Imported 11 external plug-ins (without copying)
At end I got an error dialog (see log below for more details):
"Could not write metadata for: /org.eclipse.jdt.debug."

When I tried the same thing a second time it worked.

Seems to be on the platform side.

BTW, note that you may not be able to reproduce the problem because PDE does 
not allow importing without copying any more.

This code has significantly changed.
We have no reproducable test case and have not seen this error again.
Closing.
